QuestData.Title: Power! Get The Power!
QuestData.Description: I need more power. I need more!$b$bI can control the energies, and they are enough to sustain me. For now.$b$bI will not end up withered, like those weaklings.$b$bGo out into Felsoul Hold and slay the demons. Bring me their essence and make it quick!
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the essence? I must have it!
QuestData.RewardText: <Kyrtos greedily consumes the essence.>$b$bAhh, much better. My senses are focused and ready for research!
